column8: 1. What is your software company name? (Optional)
column10: 3. What type of software development does your company focus on? (Multiple choice)
column11: 4. How long has your company been operating?
column12: 5. What types of risks does your software company usually face? (Multiple choice)
column13: 6. How often will your company encounter unexpected risks?
column14: 7. Which risk has had the most significant impact on your business over the past year?
column15: 8. How often will your company face project delays due to poor planning or changes in demand?
column16: 9. What is the main reason for your project cost overrun? (Multiple choice)
column17: 10. What strategies does your organization use to control project costs and durations? (Multiple choice)
column18: 11. How does your team usually respond when the project exceeds the budget or schedule?
column19: 12. Do you think using AI tools can help your company better manage cost and time risks?
column20: 13. Which of the following functions do you want AI tools to have to manage cost/time risks? (Multiple choice)
column21: 14. With 1 to 5 as the level, how severe is the following risks affecting your organization? —Financial risk
column26: 15. With 1 to 5 as the level, how serious is financial risks (such as budget overspending, funding issues) affecting your organization?
column27: 16. How severe is the impact of operational risks (such as inefficient process, poor management) on your organization on the level of 1 to 5?
column28: 17. With 1 to 5 as the level, how severe is strategic risks (such as market competition, project failure) affecting your organization?
column29: 18. How severe is compliance risks (such as legal and regulatory issues) affecting your organization on the scale of 1 to 5?
column30: 19. What are the three major risks that your company prioritizes mitigation? (Select up to 3 options)
column31: 20. How does your organization evaluate and classify risks?
column32: 21. What risk management strategies does your company currently adopt? (Multiple choice)
column33: 22. How effective do you think your current risk management strategy is?
column34: 23. What is the biggest challenge your organization faces in managing risks?
column35: 24. Do you understand risk management solutions based on artificial intelligence?
column36: 25. Are you willing to use artificial intelligence-based tools for risk assessment and mitigation?
column37: 26. Which functions do you think are the most useful in a risk management system based on artificial intelligence? (Multiple choice)
column38: 27. Are you willing to participate in the AI-driven risk management pilot project?
